subject: Soccer
Race and Ethnicity
Immigration and Emigration
lead_paragraph: After scoring the two goals that put Italy into the finals of the European Championship, Mario Balotelli has become an icon of a country still struggling with notions of citizenship and legal rights.
snippet: After scoring the two goals that put Italy into the finals of the European Championship, Mario Balotelli has become an icon of a country still struggling with notions of citizenship and legal rights.
